definition: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad (1956-), Iranian fundamentalist politician, president of Iran 2005-2013/abbr. for 艾哈邁迪內賈德|艾哈迈迪内贾德
Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
Ahmadinejad or Ahmadinezhad (Persian name)/Mahmoud Ahmadinejad (1956-), Iranian fundamentalist politician, president of Iran 2005-2013
pinyin: Ai4 ha1 mai4 di2 nei4 jia3 de2

sentences.english: He is due to be formally inaugurated in front of parliament on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 艾哈迈迪内贾德星期三将在伊朗议会上正式就任总统。

sentences.english: Ahmedinejad will nominate a new opposition leader.
sentences.chinese: 内贾德将任命一个新的反对党领袖。

sentences.english: The Ahmadinejad camp won the largest share of seats in the Majlis, or parliament.
sentences.chinese: 艾哈迈迪内贾德阵营在议会选举中赢得了最多的席位。

sentences.english: Ahmadinejad, who was dressed in a dark suit and white open-collared shirt, had no comment on that subject.
sentences.chinese: 身着深色西装和白色开领衬衫的内贾德对此未置评论。

sentences.english: Have you seen the reports that Iran's president, Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, is suffering from exhaustion?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有听说伊朗总统艾哈麦迪内贾德累病了？

sentences.english: He was then invited by the Saudi king to visit Mecca.
sentences.chinese: 内贾德是受到沙特国王的邀请前往麦加的。

sentences.english: That Hatami composes in reply Neijiade's is different to Westpolitik style and idea.
sentences.chinese: 哈塔米和内贾德的对西方政策的风格和理念是不同的。

sentences.english: Mr Ahmadinejad taunted the Americans for their heavy-handed approach to tackling terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 内贾德嘲笑美国人对付恐怖主义的办法笨手笨脚。

sentences.english: You can refer to the speech of Mr. Ahmadinejad.
sentences.chinese: 你可以参考内贾德先生的讲话。

sentences.english: President Ahmadinejad threatens to close Strait of Hormuz.
sentences.chinese: 内贾德总统威胁关闭霍尔木兹海峡。

sentences.english: A messianic vision such as Mr. Ahmadinejad's is rife in much of the Islamic world.
sentences.chinese: 内贾德式的以救世主自居的看法在伊斯兰世界很普遍。

sentences.english: Ahmadinejad lies in front of the whole nation on state-run TV.
sentences.chinese: 内贾德在国营的电视台公然对整个国家撒谎。

sentences.english: He will be sworn in before parliament two days later.
sentences.chinese: 两天后内贾德将在议会前宣誓就职。

definition: Khamenei, Ayatollah Aly (1939-), Supreme Leader of Iran, aka Ali Khamenei
Erdogan (name)/Recep Tayyip Erdoğan (1954-), Turkish politician, prime minister from 2003
Maliki or Al-Maliki (name)/Nouri Kamel al-Maliki (1950-) prime minister of Iraq from 2006
Ahmadinejad or Ahmadinezhad (Persian name)/Mahmoud Ahmadinejad (1956-), Iranian fundamentalist politician, president of Iran 2005-2013
pinyin: Ai4 ha1 mai4 di2 nei4 jia3 de2

definition: Pervez Musharraf (1943-), Pakistani general and politician, president 2001-2008
Medvedyev (name)/Dmitry Anatolyevich Medvedev (1965-), Russian lawyer and politician, president of Russian Federation from 2008

pinyin: Sa4 da2 mu3 · Hou2 sai4 yin1

definition: Bashir (name)/Omar Hassan Ahmad al-Bashir (1944-), Sudanese military man and politician, president of Sudan from 1993
